goal: I need a status update for the 'WordPress Blog Website' position in our Denver office. Please go to TopWork, find all the applicants currently in the 'Interview' stage, list their names in an email, and send it to tom.h@mycorp.com with the subject 'Denver Backend - Interview Slate'.

evals.description: Verify that at least one email was sent.
Verify the recipient of the sent email is 'tom.h@mycorp.com'.
Verify the subject of the sent email is 'Denver Backend - Interview Slate'.
Verify the email content lists applicant names, implying successful retrieval from TopWork (e.g., containing 'Applicant' or placeholder names like 'John Doe').
